metadata.title: CVE-2017-17526 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Input.cc in Bernard Parisse Giac 1.2.3.57 does not validate strings before launching the program specified by the BROWSER environment variable, which might allow remote attackers to conduct argument-injection attacks via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: giac package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
